# makeIterator()

**Instance Method**

Returns an iterator over the animations in the collection.

## Declaration

```swift
func makeIterator() -> AnimationLibraryComponent.AnimationCollection.Iterator
```

## Iterating over animations

- **AnimationLibraryComponent.AnimationCollection.Iterator**: An object to iterate over all animations in the collection.
